channel.title: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?
channel.description: i need to know how to set my character to admin status so i can do ::npc and stuff like that.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 04:29:53 pm[/size][hr]i fixed

item.title: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?
item.dc:creator: @darkblaze darkblaze
item.description:
@darkblaze wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:6, topic:265421”][quote author=darkblaze link=topic=350420.msg2693268#msg2693268 date=1236102586]
u go to your characters map and right click ur name then press edit. now you need to find “character rights” and change it to 3
[/quote]

wow rofl your probably the saddest person I have seen in the MSPC community :P[/quote]

sry didnt see it was rsc cuz i was just looking at my unread posts

Read full topic

item.source: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?

item.title: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?
item.dc:creator: @S4mk27 S4mk27
item.description:
@S4mk27 wrote:

Here’s how i did it, i was using a WAMP server, idk if it’ll help you. But just in case…

Run your WAMP server, and click on the little icon in the bottom right. then open “phpmyadmin” and click your database. mine is Demonik_lsd. then click on “user_credentials” along the left side and click on the pencil next to your characters name and then change the rank. it’s probably 3 or 5 to make yourself admin. Hope this helps

If i’m completely wrong, i apologize i’m new to this.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?

item.title: How do i set my character to admin status? on wamp rscd v25?
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

go to rscd_players in ur db and change rank to 1 and go to users and change your rank to 1… start paying someone for help, because this will just make u have no players when you make a server and release it… Trial and Error is a noobs best friend.

Read full topic
